# 7.0 Docs

- [Breaking change: Some APIs throw ArgumentNullException (.NET 7)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/7.0/apis-throw-argumentnullexception.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 7 where some APIs validate arguments and now throw an ArgumentNullException.
- [Breaking change: .NET 7 obsoletions and warnings in Windows Forms](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/7.0/obsolete-apis.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change where some Windows Forms APIs have been marked as obsolete or otherwise produce a warning.
